entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
